description:
Video course showing Christian couples "how to" agree on their finances. Step by step system that covers topics from spending priorities, budgeting, financial goals, saving, helping others, tithing, and more. At the end, you will increase trust, appreciation, and happiness with your partner.

You have a downloadable workbook with each lesson that includes step by step instructions on how to maximize that lesson. Also you have a pdf version of the Powerpoint used in the lesson for quick access to the lesson highlights.

When my first marriage fell apart in the early 2000's, I did not know where to go to get help. And because everything was so private, I did not want to tell people about the fights and arguments about money and other issues. So I suffered in silence until it became overtly public.

This course was designed with a lot of that pain in mind along with the lessons learned from my life, my wife Gina, my clients, and the bible.

If you want to get on the same page with your finances, improve communication, increase joy, and deepen the joy in your relationship. Marriage and Money is the course for you.
title: All Levels Guide to Finances in Marriage
